actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for cost-of-living increases in the benefits payable thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides for cost-of-living increases in the benefits payable under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance) whenever the Consumer Price Index raises by 3 percent or more in a calendar quarter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for cost-of-living increases in the benefits payable thereunder.
